Package org.tantalum.net

Class Summary
HttpGetter GET something from a URL on the Worker thread Implement Runnable if you want to automatically update the UI on the EDT after the GET completes
HttpPoster HTTP POST a message to a given URL
StaticWebCache A cache of remote http contents backed by local flash memory storage
StaticWebCache.HttpTaskFactory If you override this default implementation, you can add custom header parameters to the HTTP request and act on custom header fields such as cookies in the HTTP response.
